attributes.action: Change Business Law to specify that the the rights and interests of the Customer or Client should be the major concern of the enterprise.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is currently embedded in commercial law that protection of the shareholders interests are the major concern of business. Excessive profits are thus being diverted into shareholder dividends and senior-staff bonuses rather than benefitting the customer through reduced prices or improved services.  The entire financial equation is slewed by profits being reflected by unrealistic share valuations which are not representative of the true financial situation of the company.
